briefdescription.para: Status is logged in a line edit.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget

memberdef.argsstring: (QObject *parent, const QString &title, const Status &status=Status::Undefined, const QString &message="")
memberdef.name: StatusAction

parameterdescription.para: Whether to reset the message after the disappear message delay
